00016     gaussian_random_generator::gaussian_random_generator(double m, double s)
00017       :mean(m),
00018        std_dev(s),
00019 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00020        iff(0),
00021 #endif
00022        use_last(false)

00024     }

00026     double gaussian_random_generator::getRandom()
00027     {
00028       double x1, x2, w, y1;
00029 
00030       if (use_last)      /* use value from previous call */
00031       {
00032         y1 = ysave;
00033         use_last = false;
00034       }
00035       else
00036       {
00037         do 
00038         {
00039           x1 = 2.0 * uniformRandom() - 1.0;
00040           x2 = 2.0 * uniformRandom() - 1.0;
00041           w = x1 * x1 + x2 * x2;
00042         } while ( w >= 1.0 );
00043         
00044         w = sqrt( (-2.0 * log( w ) ) / w );
00045         y1 = x1 * w;
00046         ysave = x2 * w;
00047         use_last = true;
00048       }
00049     
00050       return( mean + y1 * std_dev );
00051     }
00053     double gaussian_random_generator::uniformRandom()
00054     {
00055 #ifndef _MSC_VER      
00056       return drand48();
00057 #else
00058       double dum;
00059       int j;
00060       unsigned i,k;
00061 
00062       if (iff == 0)
00063       {
00064         i=2;
00065         maxran=RAND_MAX+1.0;
00066         srand(time(NULL));
00067         for (j=0;j<97;++j) dum=rand();
00068         for (j=0;j<97;++j) v[j]=rand();
00069         y=rand();
00070       }
00071       j=97*y/maxran;
00072       if (j>=97||j<0)
00073         throw(Exception("uniformRandom: This cannot happen."));
00074       y=v[j];
00075       v[j]=rand();
00076       return y/maxran;
00077 #endif
00078     }
00079   }
